mapper.delete: delete from ExhLike where exhId=#{exhId} and memId=#{memId}
mapper.select: select count(id) from ExhLike where exhId=#{exhId}
select count(id) from ExhLike where memId =#{id};

select E.name,E.startDate, E.endDate, E.id, E.poster, C.museumName, M.nickname from Member M inner join ExhLike L on M.id = L.memId inner join Exhibition E on L.exhId = E.id inner join Corporate C on E.corpId = C.id where L.memId = #{id}
limit #{offset},#{size};
